name: Three Keys
description:
Three Keys is the app you were waiting for to track your Keyforge matches. It includes:

- great graphics,
- cool sounds,
- the ability to set a maximum match time,
- a "who starts?" spinner,
- a "chess-like" timer that stop each turn (can be disabled),
- the ability to choose your deck's three houses, and declare them in-game (can be disabled),
- a manual chain counter,
- the ability to steal opponent's Æmber,
- the ability to capture opponent's Æmber,
- the ability to forge and un-forge keys,
- the ability to change keys cost,
- a convenient space to see opponent's Æmber & chains.
- and much more...

The texts and informations presented in this app, dedicated to Keyforge, are under the copyright of Fantasy Flight Games. This app is not a product, it is not supported nor affiliated with Fantasy Flight Games.
